ResearchProjectDef.label: anima armor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft suits of armor made from anima tree parts. This armor projects a protective field that blocks incoming damage at the cost of neural heat buildup in the wearer.

ResearchProjectDef.label: anima weapons
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft weapons made from anima tree parts and jade. These weapons vent the wielder's neural heat to deal additional psychic damage with every blow.

ResearchProjectDef.label: anima organs
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft artificial organs made from anima grass, bark, and jade. They tend to be less efficient than natural organs, but confer a variety of benefits based on the psychic sensitivity of the bearer.
